title: Carrion Tribes
text:
Against all odds and expectations, clans of [[human]]s and [[tiefling]]s make their homes in the [[Demon Wastes]]. They are the descendants of settlers who crossed the sea from [[Sarlona]]. Long years in proximity to the evil suffusing this land have left them corruptedâ€”altered in body and mind to become the savage servants of the ancient [[overlord]]s. The Carrion Tribes lead nomadic lives, hunting and preying on each other in a state of perpetual warfare. Resources are scarce, and many tribes have turned to cannibalism to survive. Many tribes practice ritual scarring and mutilation along with varieties of [[cosmetic transmutation]] to give themselves [[fiend]]ish features.

The tribes often clash with outposts of [[dragonmarked house]]s as well as the [[Ghaash'kala]] of the [[Labyrinth]].
